title: Cannot contact support from pixel (in France)
content:
I have a big hardware issue with my pixel, and I'm not able to file a complaint...

I'm trying to follow the instructions at https://support.google.com/pixelphone/answer/7109524â€¦
> Open your phone's Settings app.
> Tap Tips & support.
> Tap Contact us.

 But there's no "Contact us" button on my pixel 4a! I don't know what to do, and I need to get the issue fixed asap.

My new pixel 4a presses the power button by itself, and tonight I woke up to find it really hot (it was scary to be honest, I thought it could explode) since it continuosly restarted by itself.
It also randomly opens the camera since it "presses" the power button twice.

I tried to boot the smartphone in safe mode, but the issue is still there.
The smartphone OS and apps are up-to-date.

I ask for a replacement.
